mutants.code:
import re

def verify_string(s: str) -> bool:
    hello = [match for match in re.findall('\\bhello\\b', s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)]
    world = [match for match in re.findall('\\bworld\\b', s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)]
    return len(hello) != len(world) == 1

import re

def verify_string(s: str) -> bool:
    hello = [match for match in re.findall('', s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)]
    world = [match for match in re.findall('\\bworld\\b', s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)]
    return len(hello) == len(world) == 1

mutants.original_line: world = [match for match in re.findall(r'\bworld\b', s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)]
mutants.mutated_line: world = [match for match in re.findall('', s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)]
mutants.code:
import re

def verify_string(s: str) -> bool:
    hello = [match for match in re.findall('\\bhello\\b', s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)]
    world = [match for match in re.findall('', s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)]
    return len(hello) == len(world) == 1
